title: Modern Micro with 24 Hour Gym!
neighborhood: Seattle, UW, Ravenna, Green Lake, Wedgwood
posting_body: Please call or text us at
to schedule from your phone or book your appointment online anytime by emailing us at Sedona @ epicasset .
Near bus line 522, 15-minute bike ride to the University of Washington, and walking distance to Roosevelt Square and Safeway!
Our open concept floorplan gives you plenty of space to personalize your home to fit your style & needs.
With 201 sq ft of space this micro studio is the perfect place to rest & refresh.
Contemporary touches included a sleek kitchen with brushed nickel finishes, customized soft-close cabinets, modern hardwood vinyl flooring, and over-sized windows for abundant natural light.
Most errands can be accomplished on foot.
$50 - $75 per occupant (max charge $150 for two occupants)
Shared kitchens available on 2nd through 5th floors
Residential Off-Street or Assigned Garage Parking
Sleek Kitchenette Featuring: Refrigerator, Microwave, Stainless Steel Sink & Custom Soft-Close Cabinets with Brushed Nickel Finishes
Dual Pane/Storm Grade Windows &  Electric Forced Air Heat
Century Link High-Speed Fiber Optic Internet
Co-Working Resident Lounge, 24/7 Access Fitness Center & Rooftop Green Space
Keyless Controlled Entry & Nightly Courtesy Patrol
